description: used memory for to map between virtual and physical memory address
Memory used by the kernel to cache data structures for its own use (caches like inode or dentry etc)

query: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=$, mode=%22system%22}[#])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=$}[#])))
sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=$, mode=%22user%22}[#])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=$}[#])))
description: Processes executing in user mode e.g. applications

query: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=$, mode=%22softirq%22}[#])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=$}[#])))
sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=$, mode=%22idle%22}[#])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=$}[#])))
description: Time Spent while cpu is sitting idle

query: (sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=$, mode!=%22idle%22}[#])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=$}[#])))) * 100

Used Shared Memory(shared between several processes thus including RAM disks)
Transmitted data of network in megabytes

query_name: Guest Time spent to run virtual cpu on guest
